playing_styles.name: Shooter
playing_styles.description: Shooting specialists who excel at long-range and three-point shots.

playing_styles.name: Playmaker
playing_styles.description: Talented ball handlers and passers who create opportunities for their teammates.

playing_styles.name: Defender
playing_styles.description: Lockdown defenders known for their ability to guard opponents effectively.

playing_styles.name: Rebounder
playing_styles.description: Specialists in grabbing rebounds and controlling the boards for their team.

playing_styles.name: Slasher
playing_styles.description: Aggressive players who drive to the basket and finish with layups or dunks.
